HTML/CSS/Js deliverables

Typography

List of all typography styles that can be used on any page.

Icons

List of all icons that can be used on any page.

Buttons

List of all buttons that can be used on any page.

Indicators

List of all analytics indicators that can be used on any page.

Base template

Page template that can be used as base for any page.
It includes header (global and instance), page title, sub navigation, content, footer (global and instance).

Form template

Page template that can be used as a generic reference for form pages.
It includes intro section with help links, all required column based layouts, all form field types (with error messages and description), label tooltips, error banner, warning banner, action buttons.
WIP - field types to be confirmed

Registration and set up account flow / Log in flow

Templates that can be used for Registration/Login flows, both for Admin and User.
It includes different steps with all layouts/elements needed and basic required validation.

Add/Edit element or Filter

Page template that can be used as reference for Add/Edit form pages (Asset, User, Event, Import, etc) or Filter sections (baseline data, effects, assets, users, records, analytics, etc).
It includes both the Edit section (top part) and the Add/Filter section (bottom part).

Add Record

Page template that can be used as reference for complex form pages such as Add Record.
It includes form sections/subsections and media/confirmation modals (to see both examples click Media button and then on the modal click Done button).
WIP - layout/elements to be confirmed

Analytics - Sectors

Page template that can be used as reference for Analytics section pages.
It includes Statistics/Indicators and Charts/Graphs/Maps/Tables placeholders.
WIP - form elements to be confirmed

Js scripts

Client side Js scripts that handle simple user interactions.

  • Password visibility toggle (source/js/form.js)
  • Submit enabling on required filled (source/js/form.js)
  • Snackbar show/hide (source/includes/_scripts.html)

Third party libraries

Client side Js libraries that handle non-HTML5 UI patterns.

  • Tooltips (Floating UI) (source/includes/_scripts.html)

added Info tooltip to form labels on Form template.
November 12, 2024:
updated form label HTML code on all templates containing forms.
November 12, 2024:

November 12, 2024:
added alert icons with related styles; added Modal dialogs to Add/Edit element template (click Delete button and then Done button to see two examples); added input type url to Form template.

added Page title component to Base template; added Add/Edit element template; added Status component; added Tooltip component (to be used on other templates); updated CSS classes on Account Setup flow pages; updated Form template.

changed Account setup flow from modal to page; changed OTP data entry from separate fields to unique field; added snackbar component.

updated screen/field management scripts; added minlength attribute to pwd fields; styled Admin Account setup OTP entry screen; added single digit Js control on OTP fields.
